thread.title: UAE ambassador Juma Al Kaabi succumbs to injuries
thread.title_full: UAE ambassador Juma Al Kaabi succumbs to injuries

title: UAE ambassador Juma Al Kaabi succumbs to injuries
text: UAE ambassador Juma Al Kaabi succumbs to injuries WAM/Web Team Filed on February 15, 2017 | Last updated on February 15, 2017 at 03.07 pm Share The Ministry of Presidential Affairs issued a statement regarding the ambassador's unexpected passing. The UAE Ambassador to Afghanistan, Juma Al Kaabi, passed away today. The ambassador passed away earlier on Wednesday from the injuries he incurred after a bomb blast in Kandahar, Afghanistan, which resulted in the martyrdom of five UAE diplomats. The bombing targeted the guesthouse of provincial governor Homayun Azizi, who was also wounded in the incident. Kandahar attack: Nation in mourning as 5 UAE diplomats killed in Kandahar attack According to a tweet sent out by WAM Arabic, the Ministry of Presidential Affairs issued a statement which said: "It is with great sadness and sorrow that we mourn the martyr of the nation, Juma Mohammed Abdullah Al Kaabi, who gave up his soul for the sake of humanity. We belong to Allah and to Him we shall return ." ???? ???? #????_ ???? ??? .
